title: The Brave New World Of 'Editing' Human Genes
teaser: A new gene technology is so powerful, it’s sparking debate about whether humankind should tinker with its own gene pool.
contentencoded:
The bioscience world is abuzz about a new gene technology so powerful it’s sparking debate about whether humankind should tinker with its own gene pool. Carey Goldberg from Here & Now contributor WBUR reports.

  • Read more on WBUR’s CommonHealth blog

Reporter

  • Carey Goldberg, health reporter and co-host of WBUR’s CommonHealth blog. The blog tweets @commonhealth.
